pullRequest.title: Add hints on Exercise Tutor Dashboard
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 Client: I added multiple screenshots/screencasts of my UI changes
 Client: I translated all the newly inserted strings into German and English

Motivation and Context


Add some hints to make the logic behind the listing of complaints and more feedback requests more transparent to the user
Description

Added hint icons which display a description as tooltip.
Also changed some German translations which I came across
Steps for Testing


Navigate to Exercise Tutor Dashboard
Checkout the hints in German and English

Screenshots


German
Beschwerden

Anfragen für weiteres Feedback

English
Complaints

More Feedback Requests

commit.message:
change some German formulations
add hint for complaints
add hint for more feedback requests

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        "complaintHint": "Shows all Complaints about assessments except for your own complaints.",
          
          
            
                        "complaintHint": "Shows complaints about assessments of other tutors. Note: complaints about your assessments are not shown here.",

                 "ENGLISH": "English",
                 "GERMAN": "German",
                 "UNKNOWN": "Unknown"
-            }
+            },
+            "complaintHint": "Shows all Complaints about assessments except for your own complaints.",
